lines.text: Whoo! God, that turns me on!
He's dead. I showed him my thing... and it killed him!
Well, no, not quite. But close.
With weapons like mine, and authorization like yours, we can do some serious damage.
There he is, the ultimate soldier. No mercy, no pity, no fear.
Nicholson did what you're doing. You read the autopsy?

In this fucking building? He was chewed to death, his body was covered in synthetic lubricants and all Dante ever said was he was building the meanest motherfucking front line morale destroyer ever... his words.
